abstract: Obama administration announces BP will be allowed to bid on new oil leases in the Gulf of Mexico, despite ongoing congressional hearings and federal investigation related to its involvement in the 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill; decision comes only one day after Interior Department cites BP and its two principal contractors for numerous safety and environmental violations related to explosion that caused spill.
snippet: The decision was a welcome development for BP, which has struggled to remake the company after the Deepwater Horizon accident last year.
lead_paragraph: The decision was a welcome development for BP, which has struggled to remake the company after the Deepwater Horizon accident last year.
